name: Grow On The Go
description:
Ever wished you could bond with your plants as if they were your pets?

Take a load off with this cosy plant care sim as you tend to the needs of your strange, yet familiar, plant pals and design the ultimate workshop at each location. Optimise your store for fit in the most plants or take the aesthetic approach where only the most beautiful may reside.



As you climb the rating system, enjoy a selection of random perks or upgrades to make each location feel uniquely special.



Catalogue your plants in order to learn about their needs in order to find them the best home possible.
